Left for Independence (; ; ) is a Spanish electoral alliance formed by Republican Left of Catalonia (ERC) and EH Bildu ahead of the 2023 Spanish Senate election. Both parties had already formed a joint parliamentary group in the Spanish Senate during the 2019â€“2023 period.
